events.title: Data HK Prize, Keluaran HK Pools, Togel Hongkong, Pengeluaran HK Hari Ini
events.description: TogelData HK Prize, Keluaran HK Pools, Togel Hongkong, Pengeluaran HK Hari IniImage 1 ofData HK Prize, Keluaran HK Pools, Togel Hongkong, Pengeluaran HK Hari IniIDR 898Data HKprize mengumpulkan informasi lengkap mengenai hasil keluaran hk pools dan pengeluaran hk hari ini dari result togel hongkong lotto. Seluruh hasil keluaran hongkong malam ini menjadi kunci penting bagi totobet hk prize dalam mendapatkan angka keluar hk resmi dan akurat. Karena di Indonesia sendiri permainan togel hongkong hari ini merupakan kegiatan ilegal yang membuat setiap informasi sulit untuk dicari. Namun dengan layanan kami ini, para bettor bisa mendapatkan info data pengeluaran hongkong dengan mudah. Seluruh angka jackpot dari togel hk prize telah disimpan dan dikemas dengan sebaik mungkin kedalam tabel data hongkong pools.Quantity:ADD TO CART

events.title: Community & Library Services Commission
events.description: Meets on the first and third Wednesday of every month. Click hereto see Community Services Commission agendas.

events.title: Workforce Development and Financial Empowerment Workshop
events.description: The City of Irvine is hosting a new six-week Workforce Development and Financial Empowerment Workshop for Irvine residents beginning Friday, November 7. The free program, held in collaboration with the Community Action Partnership of Orange County, is tailored to adults who are seeking to strengthen job skills, build confidence, and achieve lasting financial stability and growth. Workshop sessions will take place on Fridays from November 7 to December 19, 2:30 to 4 p.m. at Heritage Park Library. Topics include career exploration, job searching, resume building, and interview skills, as well as financial empowerment. Registration is open to Irvine residents only. Attendance at all six sessions is highly recommended to ensure participants receive the full benefit of the program’s comprehensive curriculum. To sign up or to learn more, contact the Office of Health & Wellness athealthandwellness@cityofirvine.orgor 949-724-6650.
events.start_location: Workforce Development and Financial Empowerment Workshop
events.meeting_point: Workforce Development and Financial Empowerment Workshop

events.title: Irvine 2/11 Marine Adoption Committee Holiday Toy Drive: Drive-Thru Drop-Off
events.description: Drive-thru Drop-off at Irvine Civic Center Sunday, December 7:9 a.m.–NoonWhat to Donate Guidelines All donations should be new and unwrapped. Drop off gifts during business hours at each location. Learn more atcityofirvine.org/holidaytoydrive.
